column5: Has anyone used timberidge outfitters out of nakina this year and how was the service cabins boats motors? Also what lake did you fish and what was the fishing like?? Heard this outfitter has been trying to sell?Thanks
I thought they were out of business? I use Arctic Watershed Outposts, and they have been great. Kap lake and Hebner are fantastic.
"Ditto" on the reply from Hayduke. Have used AWO for 15 years. GREAT service, equipment, prices and fishing.
